title: The protocatechuic acid-based deep eutectic solvent-mediated green synthesis of 1,2,4,5-tetrasubstituted imidazoles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22459-22469
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03302G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hadis Goudarzi, Davood Habibi, Arezo Monem
ETPPBr/PCA-DES was prepared by mixing ETPPBr and PCA, and characterized by various techniques, and was used as a capable catalyst for the green synthesis of 1,2,4,5-tetrasubstituted imidazoles.
